content:
I notice both furnaces have the warning "no ingredients to smelt" - let's add more iron ore to keep the production going:

"""
Let's refuel our furnaces with iron ore to continue production:
1. Add more iron ore to both furnaces
2. Extract any remaining iron plates
3. Check furnace status
"""

# Add iron ore to first furnace
furnace1 = get_entities()[0]
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace1, quantity=25)

# Add iron ore to second furnace
furnace2 = get_entities()[1]
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace2, quantity=25)

# Extract any remaining plates from furnaces
extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace1.position, quantity=4)
extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace2.position, quantity=4)

# Check furnace operation after refueling
print("Furnace status after adding iron ore:")
print(get_entities())
print("\nCurrent inventory:")
print(inspect_inventory())

# Let's craft more iron gear wheels with our plates
craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=2)
